alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 8:50PM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau, Douglas, and West Juneau. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts up to 70 mph continue near Downtown Juneau and Douglas. Recent snow combined with blustery winds could further hamper travel with reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
